1.name: Breakfast at Tiffany's
1.description: A young New York socialite becomes interested in a young man who has moved into her apartment building, but her past threatens to get in the way.

2.name: West Side Story
2.description: Two youngsters from rival New York City gangs fall in love, but tensions between their respective friends build toward tragedy.

3.name: The Parent Trap
3.description: Teenage twin sisters swap places and scheme to reunite their divorced parents.

4.name: Judgment at Nuremberg
4.description: In 1948, an American court in occupied Germany tries four Nazis judged for war crimes.

5.name: One Hundred and One Dalmatians
5.description: When a litter of Dalmatian puppies are abducted by the minions of Cruella de Vil, the parents must find them before she uses them for a diabolical fashion statement.

6.name: Yôjinbô
6.description: A crafty ronin comes to a town divided by two criminal gangs and decides to play them against each other to free the town.

7.name: The Hustler
7.description: An up-and-coming pool player plays a long-time champion in a single high-stakes match.

8.name: The Guns of Navarone
8.description: A British team is sent to cross occupied Greek territory and destroy the massive German gun emplacement that commands a key sea channel.

9.name: The Innocents
9.description: A young governess for two children becomes convinced that the house and grounds are haunted.

10.name: The Misfits
10.description: A divorcée falls for an over-the-hill cowboy who is struggling to maintain his romantically independent lifestyle.

11.name: Town Without Pity
11.description: Four American soldiers stationed near a German village face death in the rape of a local girl, and are defended by outside counsel Major Steve Garrett.

12.name: Blue Hawaii
12.description: After arriving back in Hawaii from the Army, Chad Gates (Elvis Presley) defies his parents' wishes for him to work at the family business and instead goes to work as a tour guide at his girlfriend's agency.

13.name: The Phantom Planet
13.description: After an invisible asteroid draws an astronaut and his ship to its surface, he is miniaturized by the phantom planet's exotic atmosphere.

14.name: Splendor in the Grass
14.description: A fragile Kansas girl's love for a handsome young man from the town's most powerful family drives her to heartbreak and madness.

15.name: Two Rode Together
15.description: A corrupt marshal is pressured by his army friend into negotiating the release of white captives of the Comanches, but finds that their reintegration into society has its consequences.

16.name: The Children's Hour
16.description: A troublemaking student at a girls' school accuses two teachers of being lesbians.

17.name: One-Eyed Jacks
17.description: After robbing a Mexican bank, Dad Longworth takes the loot and leaves his partner Rio to be captured but Rio escapes and searches for Dad in California.

18.name: Mysterious Island
18.description: During the Civil War a group of Union soldiers and two Confederates escape the stockade using a hot air balloon and end up on a strange Pacific island.

19.name: The Last Sunset
19.description: At a Mexican ranch, fugitive O'Malley and pursuing Sheriff Stribling agree to help rancher Breckenridge drive his herd into Texas where Stribling could legally arrest O'Malley, but Breckenridge's wife complicates things.

20.name: El Cid
20.description: The fabled Spanish hero Rodrigo Diaz de Bivar (a.k.a. El Cid) overcomes a family vendetta and court intrigue to defend Christian Spain against the Moors.

21.name: Såsom i en spegel
21.description: Recently released from a mental hospital; Karin rejoins her emotionally disconnected family and their island home, only to slip from reality as she begins to believe she is being visited by God.

22.name: A Taste of Honey
22.description: A pregnant teenage girl must fend for herself when her mother remarries, leaving the girl with only a new male friend for support.

23.name: Viridiana
23.description: Viridiana, a young nun about to take her final vows, pays a visit to her widowed uncle at the request of her Mother Superior.

24.name: The Absent Minded Professor
24.description: A college professor invents an anti-gravity substance which a corrupt businessman wants for himself.

25.name: The Second Time Around
25.description: In 1911, a widow with two children leaves New York City for territorial Arizona and becomes a ranch hand and later gets herself elected sheriff. A gambler and a rancher become rivals for her affections.

26.name: Pocketful of Miracles
26.description: A New York gangster and his girlfriend attempt to turn street beggar Apple Annie into a society lady when the peddler learns her daughter is marrying royalty.

27.name: Une femme est une femme
27.description: A French striptease artist is desperate to become a mother. When her reluctant boyfriend suggests that his best friend impregnate her, feelings become complicated when she accepts.

28.name: A Raisin in the Sun
28.description: A substantial insurance payment could mean either financial salvation or personal ruin for a poor black family.

29.name: L'année dernière à Marienbad
29.description: In a strange and isolated chateau, a man becomes acquainted with a woman and insists that they have met before.

30.name: Master of the World
30.description: In 1868, an American scientist and his team become hostages of fanatical pacifist Robur who uses his airship Albatross to destroy military targets on Earth.

31.name: La notte
31.description: A day in the life of an unfaithful married couple and their steadily deteriorating relationship.

32.name: One, Two, Three
32.description: In West Berlin during the Cold War, a Coca-Cola executive is given the task of taking care of his boss' socialite daughter.

33.name: King of Kings
33.description: The temporary physical life of the Biblical Savior, Jesus Christ.

34.name: Paris Blues
34.description: During the 1960s, two American expatriate jazz musicians living in Paris meet and fall in love with two American tourist girls.

35.name: The Curse of the Werewolf
35.description: In 18th Century Spain, an adopted boy becomes a werewolf and terrorizes the inhabitants of his town.

36.name: Pit and the Pendulum
36.description: In the sixteenth century, Francis Barnard travels to Spain to clarify the strange circumstances of his sister's death after she had married the son of a cruel Spanish Inquisitor.

37.name: Voyage to the Bottom of the Sea
37.description: When the Earth is threatened by a burning Van Allen Radiation Belt, U.S. Navy Admiral Harriman Nelson plans to shoot a nuclear missile at the Belt, using his experimental atomic submarine, the Seaview.

38.name: The Comancheros
38.description: Texas Ranger Jake Cutter arrests gambler Paul Regret, but soon finds himself teamed with his prisoner in an undercover effort to defeat a band of renegade arms merchants and thieves known as Comancheros.

39.name: The Greengage Summer
39.description: Sensitive story of a British girl's awakening from childhood into life and love on vacation in France.

40.name: The Ladies Man
40.description: A clueless, recently single graduate unwittingly takes a job as a servant in a mansion inhabited by dozens of young women.

41.name: Return to Peyton Place
41.description: The residents of Peyton Place, New Hampshire, are not happy when its most famous denizen, Alison Mackenzie, writes a "shocking" novel detailing the sinful secrets of the town. Most outraged...                See full summary »

42.name: Flower Drum Song
42.description: A young woman arrives in San Francisco's Chinatown from Hong Kong with the intention of marrying a rakish nightclub owner, unaware he is involved with one of his singers.

43.name: Il colosso di Rodi
43.description: While on holiday in Rhodes, Athenian war hero Darios becomes involved in two different plots to overthrow the tyrannical king, one from Rhodian patriots and the other from sinister Phoenician agents.

44.name: Lover Come Back
44.description: A series of misunderstandings leaves an advertising executive with a campaign for a product which has not yet been invented, while he romances his rival in the guise of its inventor.

45.name: Night Tide
45.description: A young sailor falls in love with a mysterious woman, performing as a mermaid at the local carnival. He soon comes to suspect the girl might be a real mermaid, who draws men to a watery death during the full moon.

46.name: Divorzio all'italiana
46.description: A married Sicilian baron falls in love with his cousin and vows to wed her, but with divorce illegal he must concoct a crime of passion to do away with his wife.

47.name: Taste of Fear
47.description: A wheelchair-bound young woman returns to her father's estate after ten years, and although she's told he's away, she keeps seeing his dead body on the estate.

48.name: Murder She Said
48.description: When Miss Jane Marple (Dame Margaret Rutherford) reports witnessing a murder through the window of a passing train, the Police dismiss her as a dotty spinster when no trace of the crime can be found.

49.name: Barabbas
49.description: Barabbas, the criminal that Pontius Pilate induced the populace to vote to set free, so that Christ could be crucified, is haunted by the image of Jesus for the rest of his life.

50.name: Payroll
50.description: A vicious gang of crooks plan to steal the wages of a local factory, but their carefully laid plans go wrong when the factory employs an armoured van to carry the cash. The gang still go ...                See full summary »
